name: One Dungeon (TuXsOr)
description:
I had challenged myself to make a game in a day, and this is what I managed to muster up

One Dungeon is a multiplayer game where one player is the horror and the rest are Knights.
The knights are trapped in the One Dungeon that contains this horror.
They must grab all the Crystals and place them on the pedestals to open the exit doors.

Controls

WASD - Movement
Mouse - Look Around
E - Interact
F - Pull out torch/Put away
Q - Drop held Crystal/Put away Torch
(Enemy Only) Left Mouse Button - Attack

Illustrations and UI art - Jordan Webb
